api/graph-executor-util.title: GraphExecutorUtil
api/graph-executor-util.description: The GraphExecutorUtil class provides a static API for controlling Animatix Pro animations programmatically. This is the core interface for developers who want to trigger animations from their own scripts.

examples.title: Examples
examples.description: Explore real-world examples of Animatix Pro in action. These examples demonstrate various use cases and techniques you can apply to your own projects.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: This guide will help you install Animatix Pro in your Unity project.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Create your first animation in 5 minutes! This guide will walk you through creating a simple UI button animation.
